de.fuberlin.wiwiss.d2r
Class Bridge

java.lang.Object
  de.fuberlin.wiwiss.d2r.Bridge
Direct Known Subclasses:
DataPropertyBridge, ObjectPropertyBridge
public abstract class Bridge
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class representing an D2R bridge. Extended by the subclasses ObjectPropertyBridge and DatapropertyBridge.

History:
07-21-2004 : Error handling changed to Log4J.
09-25-2003 : Changed for Jena2.
01-15-2003 : Initial version of this class.

Version:
V0.2
Author:
Chris Bizer chris@bizer.de
